p: In the Holy Quran garlic is narrated as Fūm in Surah e Baqra, verse 61, Chapter No.1 as: And [recall] when you said, “O Moses, we can never endure one [kind of] food. So call upon your Lord to bring forth for us from the earth, its green herbs and its cucumbers and its garlic and its lentils and its onions. ( Rafai, 1990).
